crew_archetypes.flavor: Data loves his cat Spot so much, he even wrote an “Ode to Spot”!

action.name: Oh, Spot, The Complex Levels of Behavior You Display!

crew_archetypes.name: First Officer Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data rises up to First Officer as a replacement for Riker after a rather uptight captain took over the Enterprise in Picard’s absence.

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: In honor of Riker's and Deanna's “conjugation” Data took the stage and gave a performance that blew everybody away.

action.name: Oh, Blue Skies, Smiling at Meeee

crew_archetypes.name: Phantasms Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data's dream system malfunctions and he becomes a prisoner of repeating and worsening nightmares.

action.name: Have You Ever Had A Nightmare?

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge Officer Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data reclaims his seat on the Enterprise-D bridge, but could something grander be in store for the fleet's first acting android captain?

crew_archetypes.name: Data as Masaka
crew_archetypes.flavor: After happening upon a comet, Data begins taking on the personality of an entity calling itself Masaka.

crew_archetypes.name: Chief Engineer Hemmer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hemmer is the Chief Engineer of the USS Enterprise under Captain Pike. He will not fight for Starfleet, but he will defend its ideals.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Hemmer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Trapped in the cargo bay with Uhura, Hemmer dispenses wisdom while trying to dispose of the damaged core.

action.name: I Commend You To The Cosmos

crew_archetypes.name: Valeo Beta V Hemmer
crew_archetypes.flavor: As a result of his encounter with the Gorn, Hemmer made the only choice to protect those he loved.

crew_archetypes.name: Wizard Hemmer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hemmer's telepathic abilities allowed him to confront and contact the consciousness from the Ionian Nebula to resolve the situation.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Pollard
crew_archetypes.flavor: After traveling to the 32nd century with the rest of the U.S.S. Discovery crew, Dr. Pollard continues her mission to save lives.

crew_archetypes.name: Balok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Capitaine du Fesarius, Balok pilotait seul son vaisseau avancé. En raison de son apparence chétive, il se servait d'une marionnette pour intimider et tromper les menaces.

crew_archetypes.name: Les Hansen
crew_archetypes.flavor: Les Hansen ont effectué la toute première mission d'étude des Borgs, qui s'est hélas soldée par un désastre.

crew_archetypes.name: Sutra
crew_archetypes.flavor: Témoin de l'Admonestation grâce à une fusion mentale avec Jurati, Sutra persuade ses frères et soeurs d'invoquer la protection des anciens êtres synthétiques.

crew_archetypes.name: Mariner rebelle
crew_archetypes.flavor: Elle est contre tous les embargos, y compris celui sur le whisky romulien.

crew_archetypes.name: Bat'leth Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Overindulging on Romulan ale, Mariner gets carried away with a bat’leth.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Beckett Mariner is a command ensign on the USS Cerritos. She breaks dumb rules that shouldn’t be there so she can do a better job!

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mariner breaks protocol by using magnetic boots a little too often, which explains why the Cerritos forgot her on a satellite in space.

crew_archetypes.name: Vindicta Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain of the Vinpocalypse, marauder Vindicta is determined to take down Captain Freeman at any cost--preferably on a rickety catwalk.

crew_archetypes.name: Deep Space Nine Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: From blackmailing Quark to breaking Worf’s mek'leth, what other adventures did Mariner have aboard Deep Space Nine?

action.name: Man! It’s Like a New Thing Every Week With Those Guys!

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: During a training drill, Mariner must take the place of her mirror universe counterpart. Unfortunately, Mariner is outed by Mirror Boimler.

action.name: Seriously, Why Is This Drill Still Going?!

crew_archetypes.name: Wanted Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: During the drill, Mariner tries on the role of the wanted captain of the three-man away group.

crew_archetypes.name: Rock'n'Roll Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mariner played a heavy metal song so inspired and loud that even a nearby Klingon ship could appreciate it.

crew_archetypes.name: Exoarchaeologist Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: In an attempt to find herself, Mariner is transferred to the Independent Archaeologist Guilds. However, despite her adventures to save the Golden Idol, she realizes that she misses Starfleet.

action.name: How Many Old Brown Pots Do We Really Need?

crew_archetypes.name: Displaced Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mariner and Boimler end up on the 23rd century Enterprise. While Pike looks for ways to send them home, Mariner studies the people around her with interest.

action.name: Look, It Was All Me, Okay?

crew_archetypes.name: Aged Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: What is happening, and why does Mariner get older and older as she approaches the pergium? Is this some kind of joke?

crew_archetypes.name: Detective Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Of all the holoprograms on the Cerritos, why did Boimler have to fire up this one? Mariner finds Dixon Hill to be an old man’s program.

action.name: Come On, Boims, Let's Do Something Fun!

crew_archetypes.name: Quimp
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mariner's good friend who really cares about her. However, their friendship did not stop him from giving her a high interest rate on the loan he gave her.

crew_archetypes.name: Wyatt Miller
crew_archetypes.flavor: Wyatt annule son mariage avec Deanna pour rejoindre les Tarelliens, afin de les aider à trouver un remède au virus qui a quasiment anéanti leur civilisation.

crew_archetypes.name: Arissa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Odo's mysterious lover turns out to be a net-girl who is being hunted and is in mortal danger.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. T'Ana
crew_archetypes.flavor: The CMO of USS Cerritos. She has a dry wit and terse bedside manner, but is a trusted doctor to the crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Bankrobber T'Ana
crew_archetypes.flavor: T'Ana and Shaxs roleplay bank robbers in the vein of Bonnie and Clyde in the holodeck, where they get into a shootout.

action.name: Hands Up Where I Can See Them!

crew_archetypes.name: T'Ana in the Box
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tendi learns something everyone who interacts with felines is bound to learn - no matter how valuable what’s inside the box is, the box itself is the true prize.

crew_archetypes.name: Lieutenant JG Sam Lavelle
crew_archetypes.flavor: Officier carriériste et motivé, Lavelle était prêt à tout pour obtenir ce qu'il voulait : une promotion.

crew_archetypes.name: Goodgey
crew_archetypes.flavor: Goodgey is a part separated from Badgey, containing all the positive qualities that were originally incorporated into the system.

action.name: Nul n'échappe à la loi terrienne

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Detmer
crew_archetypes.flavor: With a promotion and a new implant, Detmer is ready to face the trials and adventures the future holds for her.

crew_archetypes.name: Away Team Detmer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Detmer takes part in an away mission to a dead planet to stop its destruction.

action.name: There's No Reason I Should Be Fine

crew_archetypes.name: T'Mir
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après le crash sur Terre de son vaisseau scientifique, T'Mir a pris le commandement des survivants vulcains.

crew_archetypes.name: Lon Suder
crew_archetypes.flavor: Membre bétazoïde du Maquis, Suder est parvenu à canaliser ses tendances violentes pour mieux reprendre le Voyager aux Kazons.

crew_archetypes.name: Bjayzl
crew_archetypes.flavor: A smuggler businesswoman who ingratiated herself with Bruce Maddox and put him to sleep in order to sell him to the Tal Shiar.

action.name: Darling, I Heard. Have Some Tranya

crew_archetypes.name: Pregnant Eleen
crew_archetypes.flavor: The mother of the future heir, miraculously saved from execution. As regent, her first priority was to improve her people's relationship with the Federation.

action.name: I Was Proud To Obey The Laws

crew_archetypes.name: President T'Rina
crew_archetypes.flavor: As the president of Ni'Var, T'Rina must find a way to preserve the reunification of Vulcans and Romulans as she considers rejoining the Federation.

crew_archetypes.name: Enquêteur Odo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Odo a été réquisitionné par les Cardassiens au cours de l'Occupation de Bajor.

crew_archetypes.name: Constable Odo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chef de la sécurité sur Deep Space Nine, Odo était constamment présent sur la station.

crew_archetypes.name: Négociant Odo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Déguisé en marchand, Odo a rejoint l'équipage du Defiant pour empêcher un Klingon voyageur dans le temps d'assassiner le capitaine Kirk.

crew_archetypes.name: Odo arbitre
crew_archetypes.flavor: Observateur impartial, Odo a été nommé arbitre d'un match de baseball entre les Niners et les Logicians.

crew_archetypes.name: Odo naufragé
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rescapés d'un crash de runabout, Odo et Quark ont été forcés de coopérer pour survivre.

crew_archetypes.name: Odo transporteur
crew_archetypes.flavor: Odo et Nog volent l'argent du coffre-fort dans la salle de comptage du casino de Frankie.

crew_archetypes.name: Kodrak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kodrak is the Klingon alias of Odo. In the guise of Kodrak, he had the opportunity to get closer to the Founder and expose him.

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Odo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mirror Odo's desire for order and obedience made the Ore Processing Center very efficient. However, not everyone approved of his methods.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Shaxs
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lieutenant Shaxs is ready and willing to solve any issue with direct confrontation. Let’s consider ourselves lucky he is on our side.

crew_archetypes.name: Heroic Shaxs
crew_archetypes.flavor: When the entire crew was in danger from the Pakled onslaught, Shaxs sacrificed himself to save the others.

crew_archetypes.name: Bankrobber Shaxs
crew_archetypes.flavor: Shaxs and T'Ana  roleplay bank robbers in the vein of Bonnie and Clyde in the holodeck, where they get into a shootout.

action.name: Everybody Down! This Is A Robbery!

crew_archetypes.name: Kahless l'Inoubliable
crew_archetypes.flavor: Cloné dans les laboratoires du monastère de Boreth, Kahless était l'héritier légitime de la couronne de l'Empire klingon.

crew_archetypes.name: Nancy Hedford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Originally sent to stop a war, Nancy instead found herself an unwitting player in an unrequited love story between a non-corporeal entity and a human, a story which put her very life at stake.

crew_archetypes.name: Orion Dealer
crew_archetypes.flavor: The sociable Orion, who suggested Tilly to inhale volcanic vapors, actually turns out to be Georgiou's accomplice.

action.name: Volcanic Vapor, Straight From The Source

crew_archetypes.name: Concierge de l'U.S.S. Cabot
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un officier à bord de l'U.S.S. Cabot a reçu la tâche peu enviable de faire le ménage derrière les tribules modifiés de Larkin.

crew_archetypes.name: Lieutenant commandeur Saru
crew_archetypes.flavor: Officier scientifique en chef de l'U.S.S. Shenzhou.

action.name: J'ai vu l'espoir dans les étoiles
La lumière, on dirait de la musique

crew_archetypes.name: Saru (miroir)
crew_archetypes.flavor: En tant qu'esclave, le Kelpien qui n'avait pas de nom sert le capitaine Burnham.

action.name: Un esclave n'a pas de nom

crew_archetypes.name: Saru humain
crew_archetypes.flavor: À cause d'un problème dans l'holoprogramme de l'épave du KSF Khi'eth, Saru paraît humain.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitaine Saru
crew_archetypes.flavor: Le capitaine Saru consulte son second Tilly pour trouver une phrase clé pleine de punch.

crew_archetypes.name: Saru de retour
crew_archetypes.flavor: Saru quitte Kaminar et refuse un poste de capitaine pour fournir son aide et ses conseils au Discovery.

action.name: Il faut toujours faire un choix.

crew_archetypes.name: Elder Saru
crew_archetypes.flavor: On Kaminar, Saru helps his people ensure that Su’Kal is not a threat, and is also encouraged to share his knowledge with the rest of the world.

action.name: We Live Now, Together, In Communion

crew_archetypes.name: Ambassador Saru
crew_archetypes.flavor: Though an ambassador, Saru can't leave the action side of Starfleet completely - thus he takes part in a mission to stop Tahal.

action.name: We Can Face That Struggle Together

crew_archetypes.name: Romantic Saru
crew_archetypes.flavor: Saru gives a bouquet to his beloved - as a sign of his sincere feelings and with the desire to please her and distract her from worry.

action.name: I Bring These As A Gift From The Planet Elpanah.

crew_archetypes.name: Wesley Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un jeune membre de l'équipage de l'U.S.S. Enterprise-D, qu'il rejoindra plus tard en tant qu'enseigne.

crew_archetypes.name: Enseigne Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après avoir réussi l'examen d'entrée de Starfleet, Wesley Crusher a été promu au rang d'Enseigne.

crew_archetypes.name: Suppléant Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pour s'être lié d'amitié et avoir aidé le Voyageur, Wesley Crusher a été promus officiellement au rang d'Enseigne par intérim.

crew_archetypes.name: Tenue officielle de Wesley Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Wesley est revenu de son périple avec le Voyageur pour assister au mariage Troi-Riker en 2379.

crew_archetypes.name: Cadet Wesley Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Wesley Crusher a été cadet de Starfleet pendant trois ans avant de partir avec le Voyageur.

action.name: Starfleet, ce n'est pas fait pour moi

crew_archetypes.name: Wesley Enfant bleu
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un holoprogramme de Wesley Crusher en costume d'époque pique-nique avec sa mère quand un combat éclate.

crew_archetypes.name: Experienced Traveler Wesley
crew_archetypes.flavor: Having met Kore, Wesley offers her a choice - to stay where she is or become a Traveler like him.

action.name: So The Universe Is Essentially A Grand Tapestry

crew_archetypes.name: « Smiley » O'Brien (miroir)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chef de la rébellion terrienne, « Smiley » O'Brien commanda l'I.S.S. Defiant contre l'AKC.

crew_archetypes.name: Chef O'Brien
crew_archetypes.flavor: Plus âgé et sage, Miles O'Brien acheva sa carrière comme professeur en ingénierie.

crew_archetypes.name: O'Brien incognito
crew_archetypes.flavor: O'Brien reçut l'ordre d'enquêter au sein du Syndicat d'Orion lorsqu'il travailla en sous-marin pour Starfleet Intelligence.

crew_archetypes.name: RAF Miles O'Brien
crew_archetypes.flavor: O'Brien et Bashir appréciaient souvent une holoreconstitution de la bataille d'Angleterre.

crew_archetypes.name: O'Brien Falcon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après un accident de téléporteur, l'image d'O'Brien est utilisée dans le programme de holosuite du Dr Bashir pour représenter un assassin.

action.name: J'espère bien que vous allez mourir

crew_archetypes.name: O'Brien Kal'Hyah
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tourmenté par le rituel klingon du kal'Hyah, O'Brien est poussé dans ses derniers retranchements.

crew_archetypes.name: O'Brien bouc émissaire
crew_archetypes.flavor: O'Brien et Yates improvisent un numéro pour distraire le garde et permettre à Nog de s'introduire dans la salle de comptage du casino de Frankie.

crew_archetypes.name: O'Brien champion de racquetball
crew_archetypes.flavor: Le chef O'Brien est fermement résolu à battre le Dr Bashir au racquetball.

crew_archetypes.name: Hippie O'Brien
crew_archetypes.flavor: Trying to find Sisko, O’Brien, along with Kira, ends up in the late 1960s, encountering a pair of hippies.

action.name: I Think I Know What Happened

crew_archetypes.name: O'Brien at the Conn
crew_archetypes.flavor: O'Brien takes the conn of the Enterprise-D after Lieutenant Torres is frozen by Q.

crew_archetypes.name: Wedding Groom O'Brien
crew_archetypes.flavor: One thing O’Brien knows for sure is that he loves Keiko and will do anything to marry her.

crew_archetypes.name: Tobin O'Brien
crew_archetypes.flavor: A brilliant engineer. In his time, Tobin was known for his original approach to Fermat's Last Theorem. Maybe some of his originality rubbed off on Jadzia after all.

action.name: I Guess I'm a Little Nervous.

crew_archetypes.name: Albert Macklin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Writer at Incredible Tales who loves to write about robots more than people.

crew_archetypes.name: Paranoid O'Brien
crew_archetypes.flavor: O’Brien was replaced with a clone to derail the peace talks. However, the clone, for some unknown reason at first, tried to save the day.

crew_archetypes.name: Ux-Mal O'Brien
crew_archetypes.flavor: O'Brien was overtaken by one of the criminal entities from Ux-Mal, as were Troi and Data, hoping to escape imprisonment. However the entities were forced to retreat.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. commandeur Mitchell
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après un bref contact direct avec l'énergie négative, Gary Mitchell a manifesté un large éventail de pouvoirs quasi divins.

action.name: Je vais vous écraser comme des insectes !

crew_archetypes.name: Yarnek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Yarnek a forcé l'équipage de l'Enterprise à livrer un combat manichéen pour l'édification du peuple excalbien.

crew_archetypes.name: Lara
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chargée de retrouver l'âme volée du peuple skorr, Lara la chasseresse était réputée pour son sens de l'orientation infaillible.

crew_archetypes.name: Sandrine
crew_archetypes.flavor: The bar owner, an extravagant and loving woman, recreated in a holographic copy of Paris's favorite bar Chez Sandríne.

action.name: Oh, Stop Playing Games, Ma Cherie

crew_archetypes.name: Primal Peanut Hamper
crew_archetypes.flavor: Refusing to carry out a dangerous mission, exocomp Hamper abandoned the ship, after which she became stuck in deep space and then crash-landed on Areolus.

action.name: I Didn't Want To Sound Robotic

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Peanut Hamper
crew_archetypes.flavor: There is a new ensign on board USS Cerritos, and it seems that Peanut Humper can compete with Mariner in harmfulness and waywardness.

action.name: I Joined Starfleet To Piss Off My Dad

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk (miroir)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Capitaine de l'I.S.S. Enterprise de l'Empire terrien, Kirk a éliminé ses rivaux à l'aide du dispositif Tantalus.

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk kal-if-fee
crew_archetypes.flavor: Choisi comme champion par T'Pring, la fiancée de Spock, Kirk est forcé d'affronter son ami jusqu'à la « mort ».

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk romulien
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk s'est fait passer pour un Romulien afin de voler un dispositif de furtivité pour que Starfleet l'étudie.

crew_archetypes.name: Amiral Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Au terme de sa mission de cinq ans, Kirk fut promu contre-amiral.

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk Rura Penthe
crew_archetypes.flavor: Reconnu coupable du meurtre du chancelier Gorkon, Kirk a été envoyé sur Rura Penthe, le « cimetière des extraterrestres ».

action.name: Comment vont les haches de pierre et bonnets à poils ?

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk tribule
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk comprend l'ampleur du problème que constituent les tribules et ordonne qu'ils soient tous évacués de l'Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk anxieux
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk, très inquiet, relate des détails à Spock pour l'aider à se souvenir.

crew_archetypes.name: Judoka Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sometimes Captain Kirk uses judo techniques, for example, in self-defense or to get along with someone.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: While exploring the distressed Defiant, Kirk gets trapped in interspace. The only thing keeping him alive is his environmental suit.

crew_archetypes.name: Chances Taken Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk is determined to risk his life in order to stop the Doomsday Machine.

action.name: A Chance I'll Have To Take

crew_archetypes.name: Officiant Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk was officiating a wedding when the ship went to red alert. The marriage that should have just begun would instead end in tragedy.

action.name: All Captains Have One Happy Privilege - Uniting Two People

crew_archetypes.name: Farragut Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: In an alternate timeline where Kirk was the captain of the USS Farragut, he and Pike save Outpost 4 from Romulan attack - at great cost.

action.name: Quite The Ship You Got Here

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: To become an ensign, you have to love Starfleet. To become a legend, you need to be James Kirk.

action.name: Not The Worst Way To Go

crew_archetypes.name: James T. Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: His sense of duty is strong, but Kirk never loses his sense of wonder and awe for the universe.

action.name: The Only Thing That's Truly Yours Is The Rest Of Humanity

crew_archetypes.name: 21st Century Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Seeing Kirk in 21st century Toronto makes one wonder, could Federation time travelers already be in our time, posing as cosplayers?

crew_archetypes.name: Returning Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Admiral Kirk returns to take command of the Enterprise to protect the planet from V'Ger.

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk and Butler
crew_archetypes.flavor: It’s always cozy and feels like home if your favorite dog is next to you - even if you’re trapped in the Nexus.

crew_archetypes.name: Technicien Rom
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jeune frère de Quark, Rom a connu le succès au sein de l'équipe d'ingénierie de Deep Space.

crew_archetypes.name: Grand Nagus Rom
crew_archetypes.flavor: Menant la réforme parmi les Ferengis, Rom finit par être élevé au rang de Grand Nagus.

crew_archetypes.name: Rom des Niners
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rom a rejoint l'équipe de baseball de Sisko au poste de frappeur suppléant des Niners contre les Logicians vulcains.

crew_archetypes.name: Frangin Rom
crew_archetypes.flavor: Le frère cadet de Quark, qui a passé plusieurs années à travailler dans son bar.

crew_archetypes.name: Innovator Rom
crew_archetypes.flavor: Grand Nagus Rom proves looks can be deceiving, leaving those who negotiate with him to wonder who's really in charge.

crew_archetypes.name: General K'Vagh
crew_archetypes.flavor: K'Vagh oversaw the Klingon Augmentation program, but when this led to the spread of the virus, he kidnapped Phlox to stop the disease.

action.name: I Suggest You Stop Asking Questions

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Ransom
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jack Ransom is the USS Cerritos’ first officer under Captain Freeman. He has broad shoulders, shiny hair, and… where was I going with this?

crew_archetypes.name: Power Ransom
crew_archetypes.flavor: During a mission to Apergos, Ransom absorbs a strange energy that gives him great strength and power, but at the same time exposes all his weaknesses.

action.name: I Will Create a Race of Ransomites!

crew_archetypes.name: Médecin chef Pulaski
crew_archetypes.flavor: Officier médical en chef de l'U.S.S. Enterprise-D en 2365, elle a aussi servi sur l'U.S.S. Repulse.

action.name: Pourquoi ne pas me le dire ?

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Angel
crew_archetypes.flavor: The deceptive captain of the Serene Squall. Angel posed as Doctor Aspen to gain access to the Enterprise and the trust of the crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Sénatrice Cretak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sénatrice romulienne et représentante sur Deep Space 9, Cretak fut victime d'un complot de la Section 31 visant à l'écarter du pouvoir.

crew_archetypes.name: Disguised Daniels
crew_archetypes.flavor: Posing as a steward, Daniels blended in with the USS Enterprise crew in order to capture Silik.

action.name: I Think My Bunkmate Majored In Chaos Theory

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. commandeur Scott
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un ingénieux ingénieur d'origine écossaise qui arrivait invariablement à sortir de l'ornière le capitaine Kirk et l'U.S.S. Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitaine Scott
crew_archetypes.flavor: Piégé dans une mémoire d'empreinte de téléporteur pendant 75 ans, le capitaine Scott a ensuite été secouru par l'U.S.S. Enterprise-D.

crew_archetypes.name: Professeur Scott
crew_archetypes.flavor: Se présentant comme le « professeur Scott », il a aidé à fabriquer un aquarium pour transporter un couple de baleines à bosse vers le XXIIIe siècle.

action.name: Ils sont en salle des machines

crew_archetypes.name: Demo Man Scotty
crew_archetypes.flavor: After rigging a delay detonation device, Scotty is about to beam back to the Enterprise, leaving Kirk face-to-face with the Doomsday Machine.

action.name: Once It's Activated, There's No Way To Stop It

crew_archetypes.name: Chief Engineer Scott
crew_archetypes.flavor: While the crew exposed the Khitomer plot, Scotty saved the Federation president by shooting Colonel West.

crew_archetypes.name: Scuba Scotty
crew_archetypes.flavor: Scott has only one way to save Kirk and Spock from the sur-snake - dive into the water and look for them himself.

action.name: We've Lost Contact, Captain. Repeat, We've Lost Contact.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. JG Scott
crew_archetypes.flavor: Even in a disaster, Montgomery Scott shows his engineering ingenuity by attempting to first divert the Gorn, then entrap them.

action.name: Where Are My Manners, Eh? Montgomery Scott At Your Service

crew_archetypes.name: Queen Paolana
crew_archetypes.flavor: Paolana was ready for any tricks to fix her son and force him to take the throne.

action.name: A Meager Price To Pay To Get You On The Throne

crew_archetypes.name: Omet'iklan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Fierce and true to his principles, Omet'iklan joined the crew of the USS Defiant after his ship was destroyed.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Kelby
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ingénieur à bord de l'Enterprise NX-01, Kelby a momentanément occupé la fonction d'ingénieur en chef.

crew_archetypes.name: Tevrin Krit
crew_archetypes.flavor: Aux commandes du vaisseau D-756, Krit s'est fait un plaisir de décrocher la prime sur l'escroc qui l'avait dépouillé : Harcourt Mudd.

action.name: Vous me faites confiance, n'est-ce pas ?

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander MacDougal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lt. Commander MacDougal rushes to restore control of the ship after the Polywater Virus wreaks havoc on its crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Carol Freeman
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain of the Cerritos, Freeman has a flair for the dramatic, extensive second contact experience, and no time for Mariner’s shenanigans.

crew_archetypes.name: Minooki Freeman
crew_archetypes.flavor: Any hopes for a normal day on the Cerritos are dashed when Captain Freeman is possessed by the mask of Minooki.

crew_archetypes.name: Command Conference Freeman
crew_archetypes.flavor: Freeman didn't make it to the Starfleet party, but she did have a great time with those she cares about. Well, she took a little revenge for the first party.

crew_archetypes.name: One
crew_archetypes.flavor: Fusion entre les nanosondes de Seven et l'émetteur mobile du Docteur, en réalité un Borg du XXIXe siècle.

crew_archetypes.name: Outpost Vina
crew_archetypes.flavor: The sole survivor of a survey ship crash on Talos IV, Vina helps the Keeper lure Pike into the Menagerie.

crew_archetypes.name: Hain
crew_archetypes.flavor: A former accomplice of Morn’s who comes looking for the latinum he was cheated out of following a heist years ago.

action.name: A Thousand Bricks of Gold-Pressed Latinum

crew_archetypes.name: Charlene
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Doctor’s holographic wife with whom he explored what it might be like to be a working father.

action.name: Line Up Next To The Door, Children

crew_archetypes.name: Gowron klingon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gowron, fils de M'Rel, était l'un des deux derniers prétendants à la succession de K'Mpec au poste de chancelier klingon.

crew_archetypes.name: Chancelier Gowron
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gowron a consolidé son poste de chancelier klingon en triomphant de la faction menée par Duras lors d'une guerre civile.

crew_archetypes.name: Ariana
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ariana was a literal dream come true for Wyatt Miller, who had visions and dreams of her since childhood.

action.name: And I Knew You Would Be This Brave

crew_archetypes.name: Capitaine Orion
crew_archetypes.flavor: Il devait retrouver James T. Kirk à la surface d'un astéroïde pour lui remettre la stroboline que les Orions avaient volée sur le Huron.

action.name: Donnez-nous votre cargaison ou nous vous détruisons

crew_archetypes.name: Katrot
crew_archetypes.flavor: One of the Betazoid spies who tried to get intelligence through telepathy and probably drank all the cocktails.

action.name: Tout le monde cache quelque chose

crew_archetypes.name: Amiral Mark Jameson
crew_archetypes.flavor: Le temps a rattrapé l'amiral Jameson quand il a confronté Karnas en négociant une prise d'otages.

action.name: Je suis fort, agile, en pleine forme !

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. commandeur Raffaela Musiker
crew_archetypes.flavor: La détermination du Lt. commandeur Raffi à assurer l'évacuation romulienne a fini par lui coûter son poste.

crew_archetypes.name: Raffi Retrouvailles
crew_archetypes.flavor: Raffi tente de se réconcilier avec son fils Gabriel dans l'espoir de rattraper le temps perdu.

crew_archetypes.name: 2024 Raffi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Together with Seven and Rios, Raffi was sent back to 2024 Los Angeles to find the mysterious Watcher, the key to fixing the future.

crew_archetypes.name: Lady Sirella
crew_archetypes.flavor: Maîtresse de la maison de Martok, Lady Sirella doit donner son aval à quiconque souhaite intégrer la maison par alliance.

crew_archetypes.name: Sous-commandeur T'Pol
crew_archetypes.flavor: Assignée à l'Enterprise au XXIIe siècle, T'Pol a joué un rôle clé dans de nombreuses missions de l'Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander T'Pol
crew_archetypes.flavor: Promue au rang de commandeur après avoir rejoint Starfleet en 2154.

crew_archetypes.name: T'Pol (miroir)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Esclave vulcaine de l'Empire terrien, T'Pol a participé à une révolte aux côtés d'autres non-Humains.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitaine T'Pol
crew_archetypes.flavor: Quand Archer a été infecté par des parasites temporels, T'Pol a pris le commandement de l'Enterprise.

action.name: Je ne suis pas en colère

crew_archetypes.name: T'Pol en tenue EV
crew_archetypes.flavor: Le sous-commandeur T'Pol se retrouve à bord d'un dangereux vaisseau klingon qui sombre dans les profondeurs d'une géante gazeuse.

crew_archetypes.name: T'Pol Pernaia Prime
crew_archetypes.flavor: Accompagné d'Archer et de Travis Mayweather, T'Pol se rend sur Pernaia Prime pour traquer un fugitif vulcain nommé Menos.

crew_archetypes.name: Carpenter Street T'Pol
crew_archetypes.flavor: Along with Archer, T'Pol goes back to 21st century Detroit to stop the Xindi-Reptilians.

crew_archetypes.name: Meditative T'Pol
crew_archetypes.flavor: T’Pol teaches Trip various neuro-pressure techniques to help with his stress and insomnia.

action.name: The Risk of Paralysis is Minimal

crew_archetypes.name: Suus Mahna T'Pol
crew_archetypes.flavor: First, T'Pol teaches the colonists the skills of Vulcan martial arts, and then demonstrates these skills in practice, disarming one of the attacking Klingons.

action.name: Try To Strike Me. You Won't Hurt Me.

crew_archetypes.name: Cochrane du Phoenix
crew_archetypes.flavor: Développeur du premier moteur à distorsion humain, Zefram Cochrane fut la cible d'une attaque des Borgs en 2063.

crew_archetypes.name: Doctor Cochrane
crew_archetypes.flavor: A brilliant scientist, the words Doctor Cochrane left behind were a beacon for United Earth’s future.

action.name: It Will Let Us Boldly Go

crew_archetypes.name: Marlena Moreau miroir
crew_archetypes.flavor: Il a fallu peu de temps pour s'apercevoir que Kirk venait d'un autre univers. Hélas, ça n'a pas été une mince affaire de l'y renvoyer.

crew_archetypes.name: Dysek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dysek is a talented physician, but part of a system that allocates care not by need, but by assumed importance. However, he supported the Doctor in his desire to change the system.

crew_archetypes.name: Toreth
crew_archetypes.flavor: Toreth’s long-standing distrust of the Tal Shiar raises the stakes on an intense mission to smuggle defectors to the Federation without her knowledge.

crew_archetypes.name: Remy
crew_archetypes.flavor: While in command of the Serene Squall, Remy and his crew were able to capture Pike and the others, though not for long.

crew_archetypes.name: Tekeny Ghemor
crew_archetypes.flavor: A legate in the Cardassian Central Command. Ghemor is secretly involved in the Cardassian Dissident movement and is willing to risk his cover to protect Kira.

action.name: I Won't Let Them Hurt You

crew_archetypes.name: Dr Culber miroir
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un médecin éminent de l'Empire qui a soutenu la tentative de coup d'État de Lorca et Burnham.

crew_archetypes.name: Culber bajoran
crew_archetypes.flavor: À cause d'un problème dans l'holoprogramme de l'épave du KSF Khi'eth, Culber paraît bajoran.

crew_archetypes.name: Culber confident
crew_archetypes.flavor: Médecin chef et une oreille attentive pour l'équipage du Discovery. Il multiplie les recherches pour aider Gray.

crew_archetypes.name: Jinaal Culber
crew_archetypes.flavor: Culber allows the symbiont to enter his body to get the next clue from Jinaal.

action.name: Wow, This Guy Really Works Out!

crew_archetypes.name: D'Erika Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: D'Erika stages her own kidnapping on the eve of her wedding with one goal - to return her sister D'Vana to the Syndicate.

action.name: Wow, Did Starfleet Teach You Those Amazing Detective Skills?

crew_archetypes.name: Marayna
crew_archetypes.flavor: It's hard to imagine that a charming girl could turn out to be a hologram created by an alien creature to take over U.S.S. Voyager.

crew_archetypes.name: Rhys résistant
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après avoir échappé aux Régulateurs de la Chaîne d'émeraude, Rhys et l'équipage du Discovery contribuent à reprendre le vaisseau.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Rhys
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ready for any risks, Rhys volunteered to lead the operation to rescue the remaining colonists on the surface.

action.name: I'd Like To Volunteer To Lead The Evac Team

crew_archetypes.name: Médecin chef Bashir
crew_archetypes.flavor: Deuxième de sa classe dans la division médicale de Starfleet, Bashir a choisi la « médecine d'ailleurs » sur Deep Space Nine.

crew_archetypes.name: Bashir, Julian Bashir
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bashir a joué le rôle d'un agent secret dans un programme pour holosuite récréatif.

crew_archetypes.name: Changeling Bashir
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un agent Changeling a remplacé Bashir pour tenter de détruire le soleil bajoran.

crew_archetypes.name: RAF Julian Bashir
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bashir et O'Brien appréciaient souvent une holoreconstitution de la bataille d'Angleterre.

action.name: Le moins que je puisse faire
C'est ici que les héros sont forgés

crew_archetypes.name: Bashir braqueur
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bashir glisse de l'Ipecac dans la boisson du garde pour que le braquage aboutisse.

action.name: Et je glisse de l'Ipecac dans la boisson d'Howard

crew_archetypes.name: Bashir (Risa)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Leeta et Bashir effectuent le rite bajoran de la séparation sur Risa.

crew_archetypes.name: Bashir Kal'Hyah
crew_archetypes.flavor: Participant au rituel klingon du kal'Hyah, Bashir teste les limites de son endurance à travers six épreuves : privation, sang, douleur, sacrifice, angoisse et mort.

crew_archetypes.name: Julius Eaton
crew_archetypes.flavor: Les articles de Julius Eaton pour le magazine Incredible Tales prédisaient l'avenir et ses nouvelles technologies.

crew_archetypes.name: Torias Bashir
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bashir had no problems with sharing his body for the zhian'tara ritual. But he won't be happy when he finds out what Torias did with it.

action.name: Life Is Too Short To Deprive Yourself Of The Simple Pleasures

crew_archetypes.name: Assimilated Bashir
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bashir was assimilated… Is it a terrible reality or just a bad joke? Who knows.

action.name: I'm a Doctor, Not a Borg Drone. Oh, wait...

crew_archetypes.name: Reine borg
crew_archetypes.flavor: Issue de ce que les Borgs appelaient l'espèce 125, la Reine Borg a amené l'ordre dans le chaos de l'esprit collectif.

crew_archetypes.name: La Sirena Borg Queen
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Borg Queen opts for cunning over brute force in her attempts to control Jurati.

action.name: Betrayal Is An Anagram For “Believe Me”

crew_archetypes.name: Ubiquitous Borg Queen
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Borg Queen is everywhere, making her cruelest assimilation yet - the youth of the Federation and the son of Locutus.

action.name: Take Everything Back From Those Who Live Like Shattered Glass.

crew_archetypes.name: Unimatrix Zero Borg Queen
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Borg Queen discovers that some of the drones are ‘malfunctioning’ and intends to invade Unimatrix Zero to destroy it.

action.name: Stay Away From Things That Don't Concern You

crew_archetypes.name: Sidney La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sidney “Crash” La Forge mirrors her father’s kindness, loyalty and determination, which she displays when all seems lost aboard the Titan-A.

crew_archetypes.name: Assimilated Sidney La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sidney La Forge, like everyone else 25 and under, is assimilated by the Borg through a signal that activates DNA placed in her body by the transporter.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Jennifer Sh'reyan
crew_archetypes.flavor: A former member of The Red Shirts Jen aspires to become a captain one day. In the meantime she ignores Mariner and focuses on pottery and yoga.

action.name: Pff...I Don't Think About You At All

crew_archetypes.name: Seven of Nine
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après son extraction du Collectif borg, Seven of Nine a eu du mal à s'adapter sous son nouveau nom de Seven tout court.

crew_archetypes.name: Seven agent temporel
crew_archetypes.flavor: Membre d'équipage du vaisseau temporel Relativity, elle fut ensuite remplacée par Seven of Nine.

crew_archetypes.name: Seven of Nine
crew_archetypes.flavor: Malgré son passé, Seven of Nine s'est révélée être un officier intrépide capable de mettre sa vie en jeu pour défendre l'U.S.S. Voyager.

crew_archetypes.name: Drone Seven of Nine
crew_archetypes.flavor: Quand Annika Hansen fut assimilée avec sa famille, elle devint le drone borg Seven of Nine.

crew_archetypes.name: Tenue EV de Seven of Nine
Seven indulgente
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dans le but de dissimuler le Docteur aux yeux des Lokirrim, Seven télécharge son programme dans sa matrice cybernétique.

action.name: Il n'y aura pas de prochaine fois
Je ne voulais pas le décevoir

crew_archetypes.name: Seven reine borg
crew_archetypes.flavor: Seven of Nine tente le tout pour le tout pour protéger Picard et Soji en devenant la reine de l'Artefact.

crew_archetypes.name: Seven In Command
crew_archetypes.flavor: Thanks to her knowledge of the Borg, Seven takes the captain's chair of the Stargazer and leads the field mission.

crew_archetypes.name: Seven, Son of K'Vok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Seven manifests the personalities of assimilated individuals. One of them - the Klingon son of K’vok - emerges as she works with Torres.

crew_archetypes.name: Commandeur Kor
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kor, fils de Rynar, était à la tête de la force d'occupation d'Organia. Son conflit avec Kirk a contribué à établir le traité de paix organien.

crew_archetypes.name: Shinzon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Clone de Jean-Luc Picard, Shinzon a été capitaine du puissant vaisseau de guerre Scimitar contre l'U.S.S. Enterprise-E.

crew_archetypes.name: Sous-commandeur T'Rul
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dans le cadre d'un traité entre la Fédération et les Romuliens, T'Rul a été nommée responsable du dispositif de furtivité sur le Defiant.

action.name: Pas ici pour se faire des amis

crew_archetypes.name: Tchar Skorr
crew_archetypes.flavor: Prince héréditaire des Skorrs. Il est prêt à tout pour rappeler son peuple à ses racines guerrières.

action.name: Une mort noble pour réaliser un grand rêve

crew_archetypes.name: Jaglom Shrek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un courtier en informations yridien qui a vendu à Worf le faux espoir que son père était encore en vie.

crew_archetypes.name: Quarren du musée kyrien
crew_archetypes.flavor: Quarren a pu réexaminer tout ce qu'il savait sur le Voyager. Ses découvertes ont abouti à un accord entre Kyriens et Vaskiens.

action.name: J'essayais de rentrer chez moi, sur Mars

crew_archetypes.name: L'ak
crew_archetypes.flavor: In love with Moll, L’ak ran away from his family and then went with Moll in search of the Progenitor technology.

crew_archetypes.name: Ardra
crew_archetypes.flavor: Personnage diabolique légendaire de Ventax II, incarné par une arnaqueuse pour prendre le contrôle de la planète.

crew_archetypes.name: Trajok
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Humanoid wrestler. During his time on Deep Space 9, he trained Dax in the Galeo-Manada technique.

crew_archetypes.name: Doctor Vellek
crew_archetypes.flavor: An outstanding scientist of his time. His worst fears were realized when his notes on the Progenitors fell into the wrong hands.

action.name: This Power Cannot Fall Into The Wrong Hands

crew_archetypes.name: Ryn
crew_archetypes.flavor: Though Ryn is forced to implant explosives in his fellow slaves’ necks, he looks out for them and wants to overthrow Osyraa.

action.name: Who's Ready To Get Out Of Here?

crew_archetypes.name: Flint
crew_archetypes.flavor: Six mille ans et d'innombrables pseudonymes ont apporté à Flint plusieurs vies d'expérience... et d'ambition.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr Carol Marcus
crew_archetypes.flavor: Principal scientifique du projet Genesis, le Dr Marcus cherchait à créer la vie du néant.

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Robert April
crew_archetypes.flavor: Despite moving up to the position of admiral, April still finds himself tethered to the Enterprise and the (mis)adventures of her crew.

action.name: This Bridge Is More Like Home Than Anywhere Else

crew_archetypes.name: Nanclus
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nanclus was the Romulan ambassador. He was part of a conspiracy against peace negotiations between the Federation and the Klingon Empire.

action.name: I Don't Know What To Believe

crew_archetypes.name: Viriade expéditionnaire
crew_archetypes.flavor: Une étudiante en archéologie malfamée du fait de ses pratiques à l'éthique douteuse.

action.name: On ne change pas ce qu'on est

crew_archetypes.name: Viriade profiteuse
crew_archetypes.flavor: Viriade cherche à s'enrichir rapidement en s'associant avec Quark pour organiser des enchères sur Deep Space Nine.

crew_archetypes.name: Holiday Vash
crew_archetypes.flavor: Vash met Picard on Risa and fell in love with him. However, this did not stop her from using him for her own purposes.

action.name: You Look Like a Man Who Could Handle Trouble

crew_archetypes.name: Dolorex
crew_archetypes.flavor: This buzzkill Betazoid spy was intent to use her Betazoid telepathy to obtain the intelligence she so desperately sought.

crew_archetypes.name: Lieutenant Sulu
crew_archetypes.flavor: Officier scientifique sur l'U.S.S. Enterprise, il finira plus tard capitaine à bord de l'U.S.S. Excelsior.

crew_archetypes.name: Sulu escrimeur
crew_archetypes.flavor: Empoisonné par le virus Psi 2000, Sulu se prend pour un mousquetaire à bord de l'U.S.S. Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Capitaine Sulu
crew_archetypes.flavor: Capitaine de l'U.S.S. Excelsior, Sulu a repoussé des assassins venus saboter les pourparlers de paix de Khitomer.

action.name: Le paradis, mon ami, le paradis

crew_archetypes.name: Sulu tribule
crew_archetypes.flavor: Une horde de mignons tribules, le remède idéal contre la morosité pour Sulu.

crew_archetypes.name: Botanist Sulu
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sulu enjoyed botany as a hobby, taking care of a carnivorous plant he called Gertrude.

crew_archetypes.name: Doctor M'Benga
crew_archetypes.flavor: A talented medic with a secret, M’Benga reunites with Pike when he serves aboard the Enterprise.

action.name: Somewhere Out There is the Discovery I Need

crew_archetypes.name: King Ridley
crew_archetypes.flavor: M’Benga finds himself cast as King Ridley, a hero in search of a precious artifact in his daughter’s favorite storybook.

crew_archetypes.name: Fly-Fishing M'Benga
crew_archetypes.flavor: During his shore leave, M’Benga chose a quiet activity - fly-fishing.

crew_archetypes.name: M'Benga and Oriana
crew_archetypes.flavor: M'Benga helps Kirk execute their plan to lure out the Gorn, while also taking care of a Valeo Beta V castaway - a young girl named Oriana.

crew_archetypes.name: Mok'Bara M'Benga
crew_archetypes.flavor: While sparring with Dak’Rah, M’Benga learns a lot about his opponent. But lingering anger from the war weaves its way into their match.

action.name: Are You Sure You're Up For Full Impact?

crew_archetypes.name: Liana
crew_archetypes.flavor: Liana n'a jamais vu personne à part son père et les hologrammes. En rencontrant l'équipage de l'Enterprise, elle développe vite des sentiments pour Tucker.

action.name: Ils font ce que je leur demande

crew_archetypes.name: Zareh messager
crew_archetypes.flavor: Messager du XXXIIe siècle, Zareh exploitait cruellement la Colonie, dont il était le seul lien commercial avec la galaxie.

crew_archetypes.name: Premier officier Chekov
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pour recristalliser les cristaux de dilithium de l'H.M.S. Bounty, Chekov a recueilli les rayons gamma du porte-avion U.S.S. Enterprise.

action.name: Endosse l'habit, s'il est à ta taille !
Nous sommes dans de sales draps
Champs de force et déflecteurs améliorés !

crew_archetypes.name: Chekov Platonien
crew_archetypes.flavor: Téléporté pour le bon plaisir des Platoniens, Chekov se voit administrer un cocktail de kironide pour mieux se défendre.

crew_archetypes.name: Chekov tribule
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chekov accompagne Uhura au bar de Deep Space K-7, où ils découvrent un tribule pour la toute première fois.

crew_archetypes.name: Major J. Hayes
crew_archetypes.flavor: Major J. Hayes was appointed commander of the MACO detachment on the USS Enterprise. Despite the conflicts, he selflessly did his job.

crew_archetypes.name: Assistant Kes
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kes is really interested in the Doctor's experiment with his holographic family. Therefore, she gladly helps him and even agrees to come to dinner to meet the Doctor's family.

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Black
crew_archetypes.flavor: Admiral Black was quick to take charge when the situation called for it, but the animosity and mistrust so rampant in the Terran Empire would be his undoing.

crew_archetypes.name: Gotana-Retz
crew_archetypes.flavor: An astronaut from the planet Kelemane, where there was a major time shift. During the Orbital 1 mission, he managed to survive the time shift and help Voyager enter orbit.

crew_archetypes.name: Thalen
crew_archetypes.flavor: Xindi-Primate engineer working on the Xindi weapon. When captured, his voice was stolen for the search for the Azati Prime system.

action.name: I'm Losing Your Signal. Please Repeat.

crew_archetypes.name: Kareel Odan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kareel became the Odan symbiont's new host. Crusher found herself unable to carry on her prior relationship with Odan in a new body.

action.name: I Am Still Odan, And I Still Love You

crew_archetypes.name: Chancellor Azetbur
crew_archetypes.flavor: As the daughter of Chancellor Gorkon, she succeeds him after his assassination and will do anything to accomplish the future he yearned for.

crew_archetypes.name: Wyatt Earp
crew_archetypes.flavor: Créée par les Melkotiens pour punir les intrus de l'Enterprise, cette réplique d'une icône du Far West prend Kirk, Spock, Bones, Scotty et Chekov pour des membres du gang Clanton.

crew_archetypes.name: Les soeurs Duras
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Duras sisters prosecuted a civil war to replace Gowron as Chancellor with their nephew Toral.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. commandeur Dexter Remmick
crew_archetypes.flavor: Contaminé par un parasite, Remmick a infiltré le Haut Commandement de Starfleet pour en saboter la hiérarchie.

action.name: Nous cherchons à coexister en paix

crew_archetypes.name: Chapel Platonienne
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chapel, transférée et contrôlée par les Platoniens jusqu'à ce que la kironide fasse effet.

crew_archetypes.name: Civilian Exchange Chapel
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nurse Chapel is on civilian exchange from the Stanford Morehouse Epigenetic Project under Doctor M’Benga.

crew_archetypes.name: Date Night Chapel
crew_archetypes.flavor: When it comes to relationship advice, Christine Chapel is the friend you need. This doesn’t mean she’s good at her own relationships.

crew_archetypes.name: Lady Audrey Chapel
crew_archetypes.flavor: In the role of Lady Audrey, Chapel becomes a spiritual healer, able to feel the pain of others.

crew_archetypes.name: One Way Ticket Chapel
crew_archetypes.flavor: While treating the injured on Cajitar IV, Chapel and M’Benga are brought by Klingon extremists aboard a makeshift Federation ship, where they must attempt a risky escape.

action.name: I Can't Believe This Is How We're Gonna Die

crew_archetypes.name: Quality of Mercy Chapel
crew_archetypes.flavor: In the alternate universe, Chapel faces a difficult ordeal: trying to save Spock, but knowing her efforts are likely futile.

action.name: I'm Not Sure That He Will Recover From This

crew_archetypes.name: Primarch Ruhn
crew_archetypes.flavor: As a member of the royal family, Ruhn intended to use L’ak to take the throne.

action.name: We Will Defeat All Who Stand Against Us

crew_archetypes.name: Officier des communications Uhura
crew_archetypes.flavor: Officier des communications sur l'U.S.S. Enterprise, elle sera ensuite promue commandeur de l'U.S.S. Enterprise-A.

crew_archetypes.name: Commandeur Uhura
crew_archetypes.flavor: Le commandeur Uhura a servi sous les ordres du capitaine Spock durant le vol manqué du dispositif Genesis.

crew_archetypes.name: Uhura tribule
crew_archetypes.flavor: Uhura achète un tribule auprès d'un marchand intergalactique.

crew_archetypes.name: Pathfinder Uhura
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nyota Uhura's impact on the cosmos cannot be overstated, both on and off the screen.

crew_archetypes.name: Queen Neve
crew_archetypes.flavor: The villain of the Kingdom of Elysian, Queen Neve will bring King Ridley’s kingdom to its knees until she gets the mercury stone.

crew_archetypes.name: Technician Uhura
crew_archetypes.flavor: When all means of communication are destroyed due to “Apollo”, Uhura manages to establish alternative means of communication and reconnect.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Uhura
crew_archetypes.flavor: Deployed to investigate a mysterious asteroid, Uhura discovers that her communication abilities are crucial to the mission.

action.name: So the Right Time for Genius

crew_archetypes.name: Uhura in Visions
crew_archetypes.flavor: Uhura is the only one on the ship who hears a strange sound that causes frightening hallucinations.

action.name: Uh, Look, I Really Don't Want To Be Hit On Right Now

crew_archetypes.name: Orion Hurricane Uhura
crew_archetypes.flavor: At Pike's party, Ortegas reveals that getting Uhura to loosen up just takes making it feel like work.

crew_archetypes.name: Tam Elbrun
crew_archetypes.flavor: Appelé en 2366 pour une mission de premier contact, après la découverte d'un vaisseau organique, nom de code « Tin Man ».

crew_archetypes.name: Nog adolescent
crew_archetypes.flavor: Fils de Rom et de Prinadora, Nog travaillait comme serveur pour son oncle au bar Chez Quark sur Deep Space Nine.

crew_archetypes.name: Cadet Nog
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nog devint le premier membre ferengi de Starfleet, et fut assigné sur DS9 en tant qu'élève officier pour des études sur le terrain.

crew_archetypes.name: Nog siège
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pendant le siège d'AR-558, Nog reconverti en éclaireur mobilise toute son audition ferengi pour repérer une grande colonne de Jem'Hadars en approche.

crew_archetypes.name: Bluffing Nog
crew_archetypes.flavor: When Nog and Quark end up in 1947 as a result of sabotage, Nog decides to bluff to save both himself and his uncle.

action.name: You Want The Truth, I'll Tell You The Truth

crew_archetypes.name: Lursa Duras
crew_archetypes.flavor: Aînée des soeurs Duras, Lursa complota afin que sa famille dirige l'Empire klingon.

crew_archetypes.name: Cyrus Redblock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ce gangster issu d'un holoroman Dixon Hill a retenu les participants de Starfleet en otage lors d'un dysfonctionnement de l'holodeck.

crew_archetypes.name: Adira Tal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Adira, enfin unie correctement au symbiote trill Tal, retrouve ses souvenirs de leurs vies précédentes.

crew_archetypes.name: Adira xahéenne
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pour faire passer des médicaments au groupe de Theta Zeta, Adira se déguise en Xahéenne.

action.name: Le son est une onde mécanique

crew_archetypes.name: Adira violoncelliste
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après avoir successivement perdu et fusionné avec Gray, Adira pratique le violoncelle comme une forme de communion.

crew_archetypes.name: Away Team Adira
crew_archetypes.flavor: Together with Discovery, Adira goes on their first away mission to repair Deep Space Repair Beta Six because of their experience with programmable matter.

crew_archetypes.name: Doctor Kovich
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kovich’s insight and experience make him a valuable resource to the Federation and the Discovery crew.

action.name: Guess I'm a Man of Widely Varied Interests

crew_archetypes.name: Iden
crew_archetypes.flavor: Iden était à la tête d'une rébellion d'hologrammes doués de conscience, face à leurs créateurs hirogènes qui en faisaient les proies de leurs simulations de chasse.

crew_archetypes.name: Adult Rukiya
crew_archetypes.flavor: Having merged her consciousness with the entity Debra, Rukiya is free from the sickness that kept her locked away. Now, she is the one telling the stories.

crew_archetypes.name: Ibudan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Smuggler, murderer and generally unpleasant person. He escaped from prison with the sole purpose of taking revenge on Odo.

action.name: You'd Better Ask Your Federation Superiors About That One

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. JG Ayala
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ayala was forced to join the Voyager crew, where he now held the provisional rank of Lieutenant JG.

action.name: Sans vouloir vous compliquer la vie
Votre connaissance de la chirurgie montre ses limites

crew_archetypes.name: Garak tailleur
crew_archetypes.flavor: Garak prétend n'être qu'un « simple tailleur », mais certains à bord de DS9 le soupçonnent d'être bien plus que cela.

crew_archetypes.name: Garak (miroir)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Officier supérieur du Terok Nor miroir, Garak faisait régner la discipline avec brutalité.

crew_archetypes.name: Garak Ordre Obsidien
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après ses retrouvailles avec son mentor Enabran Tain, Garak reçut pour première mission d'interroger un prisonnier métamorphe : Odo.

crew_archetypes.name: Garak, Elim Garak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Curieux des activités de Bashir, Garak s'introduit dans son holoprogramme d'agent secret pour le rejoindre.

action.name: Tout n'est pas perdu pour vous
Vous venez peut-être de sauver tout le quadrant Alpha

crew_archetypes.name: Garak en tenue EV
crew_archetypes.flavor: Soudoyé par Sisko, Garak rejoint l'opération de recyclage d'O'Brien sur Empok Nor, station cardassienne truffée de pièges.

action.name: Le capitaine m'a filé un pot-de-vin

crew_archetypes.name: Hologram Garak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Garak doesn't mind listening to Quark's chatter, but only in the form of a simulation in the holodeck.

crew_archetypes.name: Phased Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Boimler was helping Rutherford with a transporter experiment and ended up phased after an accident.

crew_archetypes.name: USS Titan Bradward Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Boimler joins the crew of the USS Titan, where he is promoted to lieutenant junior grade.

action.name: I Don’t Have To Write That Down

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bradward Boimler is a command ensign on the USS Cerritos. He is desperate to prove himself a competent and valuable member of the crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Cowpoke Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Brad Boimler is the rootin'est tootin'est cowpoke around. If he wants to be sheriff someday, he'll have to get used to the itchy chaps.

action.name: This Holodeck Ain't Big Enough for the Both of Us

crew_archetypes.name: Fanboy Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Get your “Voy” Collector’s Plate ready ‘cause Captain Proton and the creator of Fair Haven, Lt. Tom Paris, will be visiting the Cerritos!

action.name: Fine, You Want to Play It That Way?

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Boimler is on a satellite repair mission making himself useful and enjoying the view while he still has the opportunity.

crew_archetypes.name: Borg Baby Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Wanting to get the maximum score for the drill, Boimler passed it over and over again, each time saving more and more Borg babies.

crew_archetypes.name: Excretus of Borg
crew_archetypes.flavor: Boimler finds himself completely assimilated by the Borg during a holoprogram drill. And all he wanted was just to get a perfect score.

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: During Mariner’s drill, Terran Boimler exposed her when she greeted him with her left hand.

action.name: Did You Just Salute Me With Your Left Hand?

crew_archetypes.name: Vineyard Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: While on temporary leave, Boimler went to his family's vineyard, where Mariner finds him to propose another adventure.

crew_archetypes.name: Displaced Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Once on the Enterprise, Boimler was incredibly excited about meeting his idols, though keeping his future knowledge under wraps proved to be a challenge.

crew_archetypes.name: Bold Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: One step away from defeat, Boimler gains a surge of courage and finds a way to get to the terminal before delta shift.

crew_archetypes.name: Jardinier Boothby
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jardinier de l'Académie de Starfleet des décennies durant, Boothby a dispensé ses conseils à des générations de cadets.

action.name: C'est le véritable McCoy que vous avez ici.

crew_archetypes.name: Shran commando
crew_archetypes.flavor: Andorien de la Garde impériale, Shran a affronté le capitaine Archer dans le monastère de P'Jem.

action.name: La glace forge la véritable force

crew_archetypes.name: Shran rançon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Shran demande un service pour sauver sa fille, enlevée contre rançon.

action.name: Vous ne savez donc rien faire ?
Je vais vous montrer ce qui se passera

crew_archetypes.name: Général Oh
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après avoir découvert le monde d'origine des synthétiques, Oh abandonne son déguisement de Starfleet pour prendre la tête de la flotte romulienne, bien décidée à les exterminer.

action.name: Notre plan touche enfin à son terme

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Hoya
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Benzite ensign, Hoya died during a mission to Torga IV in the Gamma Quadrant.

action.name: Trop de choses sont en jeu

crew_archetypes.name: Odona
crew_archetypes.flavor: Odona allowed herself to be infected in order to infect the other inhabitants of Gideon and save the planet from overpopulation.

crew_archetypes.name: Commandeur Kang
crew_archetypes.flavor: Forcé à affronter Kirk, Kang et son homologue durent collaborer pour vaincre leur manipulateur intangible.

crew_archetypes.name: Zobral
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chef rebelle devenu terroriste, Zobral mène son clan contre le gouvernement oppressif de la planète mère torothienne.

action.name: Ce n'est pas de mon ressort
Baissez les yeux de temps à autre

crew_archetypes.name: Riley Frazier
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ancien officier scientifique de l'U.S.S. Roosevelt, Riley a été assimilée pendant la bataille de Wolf 359.

crew_archetypes.name: Picard du Stargazer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Officier en chef de l'U.S.S. Stargazer, sur lequel il a d'abord servi en tant que contrôleur de vol.

crew_archetypes.name: Picard de l'Enterprise-D
crew_archetypes.flavor: Capitaine du légendaire U.S.S. Enterprise-D, Picard a eu un rôle crucial dans les nombreux succès de la Fédération.

crew_archetypes.name: Locutus de Borg
crew_archetypes.flavor: Capturé par les Borgs, Jean-Luc Picard, une fois assimilé, a reçu le nom de Locutus.

crew_archetypes.name: Picard de l'Enterprise-E
crew_archetypes.flavor: En rade sur la Terre du XXIe siècle, le capitaine Picard s'est retrouvé face à l'implacable reine Borg.

crew_archetypes.name: Dixon avec mitrailleuse
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pendant la tentative d'assimilation de l'Enterprise-E, Picard a éliminé un drone borg à l'aide de balles holographiques.

crew_archetypes.name: Galen
crew_archetypes.flavor: Picard a joué le rôle du contrebandier Galen après s'être fait capturer par des pillards qui cherchaient une arme psionique vulcaine.

crew_archetypes.name: Détective Dixon Hill
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dans son temps libre, Picard se plonger dans les holoromans de la collection Dixon Hill.

crew_archetypes.name: Picard fondateur CdP
crew_archetypes.flavor: En remplaçant Jonathan Archer au pied levé, Picard a contribué à former la Coalition des Planètes. (Vainqueur du vote des joueurs de la Deuxième Bataille de New York !)

crew_archetypes.name: Jean-Luc Picard transi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Picard a joué le rôle de l'amant jaloux de Lwaxana pour tenter de l'arracher aux griffes de Daimon Tog.

action.name: Une vie qui en vaut la peine
Darmok et Jalad sont dans un bateau

crew_archetypes.name: Picard Kamin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Influencé par une sonde de Kataan, Picard endosse l'identité d'un forgeron nommé Kamin.

crew_archetypes.name: Picard Vashti
crew_archetypes.flavor: Avant de se diriger vers Freecloud à la recherche de Bruce Maddox, Picard passe par le centre de relocalisation romulien sur Vashti pour y trouver de l'aide.

crew_archetypes.name: Picard en tenue EV
crew_archetypes.flavor: Picard, Worf et Hawk traversent la coque extérieure de l'Enterprise à pied pour retirer manuellement la balise borg.

crew_archetypes.name: Picard Fête cap. Picard
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pour une fête des enfants dédiée (bien malgré lui) au capitaine du vaisseau, Picard se voit contraint d'élire les gagnants d'un concours artistique.

crew_archetypes.name: Picard démission
crew_archetypes.flavor: Picard n'hésite pas à démissionner quand Starfleet interrompt l'évacuation romulienne après l'attaque des synthétiques sur Mars.

crew_archetypes.name: Picard escrime
crew_archetypes.flavor: Le passe-temps fétiche de Picard est idéal pour garder la forme et apaiser l'esprit.

action.name: Rien ne marche vraiment comme espéré

crew_archetypes.name: 2024 Picard
crew_archetypes.flavor: Picard finds himself racing to undo a nightmarish future.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. JG Picard
crew_archetypes.flavor: Offered a choice on an alternate path from his past, Picard sees how a particular moment defined his Starfleet career.

action.name: I Believe That I Can Do More

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge Picard
crew_archetypes.flavor: This is the finale - and the last opportunity for Picard and his team to rid the galaxy of its greatest danger.

action.name: What Began Over 35 Years Ago Ends Tonight

crew_archetypes.name: Horseback Picard
crew_archetypes.flavor: Picard's plans included a relaxing ride on a horse on the holodeck, but Riker summoned him to the bridge.

crew_archetypes.name: Officiant Picard
crew_archetypes.flavor: Picard gives a speech at Riker and Troi's wedding, not forgetting to mention how much he will miss the two of them on the ship.

action.name: I Wish You Both Clear Horizons

crew_archetypes.name: Quark barman
crew_archetypes.flavor: Propriétaire du bar Chez Quark, c'est un des hôtes les plus pittoresques de Deep Space Nine.

crew_archetypes.name: Quark klingon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Suite à la mort d'un Klingon dans le bar Chez Quark, sa veuve Grilka amène Quark sur Qo'noS.

action.name: Vous ne pouvez pas escalader une montagne qui est en miettes !

crew_archetypes.name: Quark tribule
crew_archetypes.flavor: Quark doit faire face à une infestation de tribules dans son bar.

action.name: On pourrait construire une autre station

crew_archetypes.name: Audrid Quark
crew_archetypes.flavor: Quark became a reluctant host to Audrid and his trepidation only increased when he found his personality at odds with hers.

action.name: The Entity That Lent Me This Body Wishes to Speak

crew_archetypes.name: People Person Quark
crew_archetypes.flavor: As a bartender, Quark greatly enjoys interacting with his guests. He has a keen eye for when crew members act out of character.

action.name: Too Quiet. Something Is Terribly Wrong.

crew_archetypes.name: Bar Owner Quark
crew_archetypes.flavor: Quark plunged headlong into business - and by 2381 he already had his own chain of bars 'Quark's Bar'.

crew_archetypes.name: Entrepreneur Quark
crew_archetypes.flavor: Never one to miss a business opportunity, Quark tries to make some quick latinum off an innocent Harry Kim.

crew_archetypes.name: Cutler exploratrice
crew_archetypes.flavor: Les talents de cette entomologiste étaient très demandés à la surface de la planète qui allait devenir Archer IV.

action.name: Merci de m'avoir choisie pour cette mission

crew_archetypes.name: Nilz Baris
crew_archetypes.flavor: Baris really wanted to arrest Kirk for wasting grain, but thanks to tribbles he got the opportunity to arrest the one who poisoned the grain.

action.name: Now, I Want You To Keep That Grain Safe

crew_archetypes.name: Général Martok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Combattant klingon de talent, Martok s'est élevé au rang de général, puis à celui de chancelier de l'Empire klingon.

crew_archetypes.name: Martok du XXIIIe siècle
crew_archetypes.flavor: Une version de Martok issue d'un univers parallèle, pur produit de l'Empire klingon du XXIIIe siècle.

action.name: Ours à dents de sabre piégé
Je mènerai toutes les batailles. Peu importe où.

crew_archetypes.name: Narissa récupération
crew_archetypes.flavor: Agent du Zhat Vash chargé d'obtenir des renseignements sur les lieux du projet de récupération borg.

action.name: Quelque chose de bien pire arrive

crew_archetypes.name: Lieutenant Rizzo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sous la direction du commodore Oh, Narissa se fait passer pour un agent humain de Starfleet dans le but de chasser les androïdes biologiques.

action.name: Mon meilleur homme est sur le coup

crew_archetypes.name: Berlinghoff Rasmussen
crew_archetypes.flavor: « Inventeur » du XXIIe siècle, Rasmussen se faisait passer pour un historien du futur afin de piller l'Enterprise-D.

crew_archetypes.name: Acting Chief Engineer Joe Carey
crew_archetypes.flavor: After the tragic events in the Delta Quadrant, Carey became the Chief Engineer, a position he was reluctant to give up.

action.name: I'm The Senior Officer And I Speak For Engineering

crew_archetypes.name: Forra Gegen
crew_archetypes.flavor: Paléontologue moléculaire voth, Gegen a découvert que les sauriens étaient originaires de la Terre.

crew_archetypes.name: West klingon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pour tenter d'assassiner le président de la Fédération, le colonel West se déguise en Klingon.

action.name: Nous les remettrons à leur place

crew_archetypes.name: Telek R'Mor
crew_archetypes.flavor: Conduisant des recherches près d'un trou de ver, Telek R'Mor accepta de porter un message de l'U.S.S. Voyager, en panne.

crew_archetypes.name: Envahisseur 5e Dimension
crew_archetypes.flavor: L'un des deux aliens photoniques qui avaient pris l'holoprogramme Capitaine Proton pour argent comptant et déclaré la guerre au Dr Chaotica.

crew_archetypes.name: Colonel Kabla
crew_archetypes.flavor: Le colonel Kabla commandait les forces kzintis de l'Île aux reclus pour tenter d'obtenir des reliques de guerre dans les boîtiers interrupteurs slavennes. Mauvaise idée.

action.name: Vous êtes de la viande pour nos repas

crew_archetypes.name: Kai Opaka
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chef spirituel des Bajorans pendant l'Occupation, Opaka fut la première à reconnaître l'Émissaire en Sisko.

crew_archetypes.name: Twin Mistresses of Evil
crew_archetypes.flavor: A pair of villainesses from the Captain Proton holoprogram, played skillfully by twin crew members, Jenny and Megan Delaney.

action.name: You'll Be Our Puppet. Our Slave.

crew_archetypes.name: Chef de sécurité Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chef de sécurité de l'U.S.S. Enterprise-D, il a été le premier Klingon à être diplômé de l'Académie de Starfleet.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander du Defiant Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Commandeur de l'U.S.S. Defiant, un vaisseau de guerre qui a participé à des actions contre le Dominion et les Borgs.

crew_archetypes.name: Worf guerre civile
crew_archetypes.flavor: Appelé à la défense de l'Empire dans la guerre civile, Worf a mis au rancart sa commission de Starfleet pour rallier la cause de Gowron.

crew_archetypes.name: Régent Worf (miroir)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Le régent brutal de l'Alliance klingo-cardassienne dans un univers-miroir.

crew_archetypes.name: Will Scarlett
crew_archetypes.flavor: Forcé de remplacer Will Scarlett dans le Robin des bois version Q, Worf était tout sauf joyeux.

crew_archetypes.name: Duchamps
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après un accident de téléporteur, l'image de Worf est utilisée dans un programme de holosuite pour représenter un homme de main du Dr Noah.

crew_archetypes.name: Colonel Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Avocat respecté, le Colonel Worf représentait Kirk et McCoy lors de leur procès pour meurtre sur Qo'noS.

action.name: Je n'ai pas prévu de maillot

crew_archetypes.name: Worf en tenue EV
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après l'assimilation de Hawk, Worf est intervenu pour secourir Picard et détruire la balise borg.

crew_archetypes.name: Worf sage-homme
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lors d'une urgence à l'échelle de tout le vaisseau, Worf doit aider Keiko O'Brien qui vient de perdre les eaux.

crew_archetypes.name: Willie Hawkins
crew_archetypes.flavor: A famous baseball player and friend of Benny Russell who also flirts with Cassie during Sisko’s vision.

crew_archetypes.name: Worf Kal'Hyah
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pour préparer son mariage avec Jadzia, Worf et ses amis se plient aux épreuves du Kal'Hyah.

crew_archetypes.name: Mok'bara Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Worf teaches Jaxa using a fake advancement test he calls a gik’tail to encourage her to speak up.

crew_archetypes.name: Handler Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Worf, son of Mogh, of the Houses of Martok and Rhozhenko, bane of the Duras family and slayer of Gowron, breaks his commitment to pacifism to save Raffi.

action.name: I Told You, Do Not Engage

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: A warrior from birth, Worf gives it his all in the final battle with the Borg.

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Having to put on a dress uniform certainly doesn't make Worf happy. However, for the sake of a good roast, he endures it.

action.name: I Am Happy To Bring More Food

crew_archetypes.name: Laneth
crew_archetypes.flavor: « Sujet d'une amélioration génétique qui a mal tourné, Laneth lutte pour conserver son coeur klingon. »

action.name: Je meurs pour vous, pas pour moi

crew_archetypes.name: Voyou Nausicaan
crew_archetypes.flavor: One of Nausicaan dom-jot players who stabbed Picard in the heart during a bar fight.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Taurik
crew_archetypes.flavor: A witty and inquisitive Vulcan who befriended several ensigns. He was enthusiastic about his work with La Forge on the warp drive.

crew_archetypes.name: Su'Kal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Su'Kal vit dans un hologramme créé par sa mère avant sa mort. Pour être sauvé, il doit faire face à sa plus grande crainte : une autre réalité.

crew_archetypes.name: Dexa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sur un lointain astéroïde, Dexa et ses camarades talaxiens s'opposent aux mineurs qui veulent détruire leur nouveau foyer riche en minerais précieux.

crew_archetypes.name: Commandeur Nevesa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Commandant d'un vaisseau romulien, Nevesa a été capturée par l'équipage de l'Enterprise en tentant d'empêcher Spock de s'enfuir de son vaisseau.

crew_archetypes.name: Kilana
crew_archetypes.flavor: À la tête d'une escouade de Jem'Hadars, Kilana a ordonné à ses troupes d'attaquer l'équipage de Sisko pour secourir un Fondateur blessé.

crew_archetypes.name: Zarabeth
crew_archetypes.flavor: Piégée seule cinq mille ans dans le passé, Zarabeth s'amourache d'un visiteur surprise : Spock.

crew_archetypes.name: Nona
crew_archetypes.flavor: N'écoutant que ses convictions, Nona trahit son mari pour empêcher les siens d'accéder au pouvoir.

crew_archetypes.name: Zyree
crew_archetypes.flavor: Zyree aide les Ferengis à négocier une grande quantité de vin de tulaberry.

action.name: C'est ici que naissent les occasions

crew_archetypes.name: Le professeur
crew_archetypes.flavor: Conçu par l'ordinateur de l'Enterprise, le Professeur a été mis au point pour être le défi ultime du Détective Data.

crew_archetypes.name: Fred
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Soong-type Android over 600 years old, his keen interest in centuries-old artifacts places the Q’Mau fence in grave danger.

action.name: How Effervescent To Meet New Clients

crew_archetypes.name: Lieutenant Arex Na Eth
crew_archetypes.flavor: Navigateur à bord de l'Enterprise, Arex s'est retrouvé à jouer du luth sous l'influence d'une potion d'amour.

crew_archetypes.name: Acting Captain Arex
crew_archetypes.flavor: Amid the rash of strange pranks aboard the Enterprise, Arex takes the role of acting captain while the rest of the bridge crew have lunch.

action.name: We Didn't Cause This To Happen
Comment ne pas mener une conversation

crew_archetypes.name: Borg Queen Jurati
crew_archetypes.flavor: Having achieved harmony with the Borg Queen's consciousness, Jurati has forged a new and more humane collective aimed at saving lives.

crew_archetypes.name: Devious Duet Jurati
crew_archetypes.flavor: In a covert mission to restore the timeline, Jurati takes center stage during a gala, but in her performance it becomes apparent that the Borg Queen has taken over.

action.name: Ce président n'est pas au-dessus des lois

crew_archetypes.name: Yeoman Rand
crew_archetypes.flavor: Assigné à l'U.S.S. Enterprise, le yeoman Rand a fidèlement servi dans la division des opérations.

crew_archetypes.name: Janice Rand en repos
crew_archetypes.flavor: En 2266, la yeoman Janice Rand a croisé un jeune homme incapable de contrôler ses pouvoirs de Thasien.

crew_archetypes.name: Flashback Janice Rand
crew_archetypes.flavor: Janice Rand has no hesitation in supporting Sulu's decision to defy orders and break Kirk and McCoy out of the Klingon prison.

action.name: I Assure You It Will Not Happen Again

crew_archetypes.name: Enseigne Marie Kaplan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un membre d'équipage de l'USS Voyager décédé pendant qu'il répondait à un appel de détresse.

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Vance
crew_archetypes.flavor: The leader of the Federation in 32nd century. After the Burn, his belief that the Federation could be revived was rapidly fading.

action.name: The Past Is The Only Light With Which We Can See The Future.

crew_archetypes.name: Salia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Née de parents de factions rivales, Salia est vouée à unir son peuple sous un règne neutre.

action.name: Ne nous quittons pas comme ça

crew_archetypes.name: Ruon Tarka
crew_archetypes.flavor: Originally tasked with understanding the Dark Matter Anomaly, Ruon Tarka became obsessed with destroying it through dangerous means.

crew_archetypes.name: T'Kuvma
crew_archetypes.flavor: T'Kuvma cherchait à unifier l'Empire klingon morcelé face à la Fédération.

crew_archetypes.name: Patar
crew_archetypes.flavor: Patar estimait se prémunir de menaces futures en laissant une intelligence artificielle prendre des décisions à sa place.

crew_archetypes.name: Doopler Emissary
crew_archetypes.flavor: As a trade emissary, this Doopler must keep his social anxiety under control to prevent dangerous exponential dooplercation.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Simon van Gelder
crew_archetypes.flavor: A talented psychologist and the director of Tantalus Penal Colony. His memories were secretly damaged by his colleague Dr. Adams.

action.name: Edited, Adjusted, Subverted Me, But I Won't Forget!

crew_archetypes.name: Amiral Nechayev
crew_archetypes.flavor: Le vice-amiral Nechayev commandait les opérations de Starfleet aux environs de l'Union cardassienne.

crew_archetypes.name: Festive Manuele Atoa
crew_archetypes.flavor: At Jadzia's bachelorette party, Lieutenant Manuele Atoa performs a fire dance that ignites the crowd’s excitement.

action.name: Thank For Getting Me The Day Off

crew_archetypes.name: Enseigne Seska
crew_archetypes.flavor: Servant sur le Val Jean en tant que membre du Maquis, Seska se révéla par la suite être un agent cardassien sous les traits d'une Bajorane.

crew_archetypes.name: Seska kazonne
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après avoir quitté le Voyager, Seska rejoint par la suite les Kazons en tant qu'épouse du Premier Maje Culluh.

crew_archetypes.name: Seska emprise du Maquis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un an après sa mort, Seska lègue à l'équipage du Voyager une dernière surprise dans un holoprogramme abandonné.

crew_archetypes.name: Seska and Culluh
crew_archetypes.flavor: Seska and Culluh teamed up to gain advanced Starfleet technology. To achieve their goals, they often resorted to manipulation and tricks.

crew_archetypes.name: Emotionally Heightened T'Lyn
crew_archetypes.flavor: T'Lyn, according to her colleagues, is too emotional for a Vulcan. Though her intuitive decisions were useful, she was still transferred to the Cerritos.

action.name: Logic Is The Beginning Of Wisdom, Not The End

crew_archetypes.name: Kevin Uxbridge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Un être immortel qui a juré d'être pacifique doit affronter les ramifications de sa rancune et de sa colère.

action.name: Vous ne comprenez pas l'ampleur de mon crime
Ce qui est imparfait doit être stérilisé

crew_archetypes.name: Janeway Arachnia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Reine du peuple araignée dans les holoromans « Capitaine Proton », Janeway s'est consacrée pleinement à son rôle : vaincre le Dr Chaotica.

crew_archetypes.name: Amiral Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: Deux ans après son retour du quadrant Delta, Janeway était promue vice-amiral.

action.name: Il y a du café dans cette nébuleuse !

crew_archetypes.name: Janeway assimilée
crew_archetypes.flavor: Le capitaine Janeway s'est laissé assimiler partiellement afin d'administrer un nanovirus aux Borgs.

action.name: La guerre n'a pas sa place ici

crew_archetypes.name: Janeway polarique
crew_archetypes.flavor: Après avoir été aspirée par une anomalie temporelle en compagnie du lieutenant Paris, Janeway tente de sauver une planète de la tentative de son équipage pour les secourir.

crew_archetypes.name: Disguised Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: Janeway and the away team blend into 20th century Los Angeles to pinpoint the location of Captain Braxton.

crew_archetypes.name: Puppy-Placated Janeway
